DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the HIV disease progression in HIV-infected Thai children.
DOC.detailed_description: This is a multicenter, observational cohort study. HIV-infected children from 5 institutions are followed to assess HIV disease progression: 1. Bamrasnaradura infectious disease institute,2. Faculty of Medicine Siriraj Hospital, Mahidol University, 3. Chiangrai Prachanukroh Hospital, 4. Sanpatong Hospital and 5. HIV-NAT, Thai Red Cross AIDS Research Center.
DOC.criteria: 1. age < 18 years old 2. Have confirmed HIV infection (ELISA,HIVDNA PCR,HIVRNA PCR) 3. Signed consent form 1. Hospitalization 2. Emergency case 3. Incomplete Medical Record
